DOC.brief_summary: The investigator pilot test intervention randomize 30 couple one three condition : 1 ) DuoPACT , newly-developed couple intervention ; 2 ) Life Steps , standardize antiretroviral adherence intervention HIV+ individual ; 3 ) treatment usual ( TAU ) assessment-only control condition . After randomization , intervention session deliver weekly ( 6 DuoPACT session , 3 Life Steps session ) . All couple assess pre/post intervention evaluate intervention acceptability feasibility .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Gay male couple . 2 . One partner must HIV positive antiretroviral medication . Must able consent follow study protocol .
